price: Ìyẹn ni A fi san wọ́n ní ẹ̀san nítorí pé, wọ́n ṣàì moore. Ǹjẹ́ A máa san ẹnì kan lẹ́san ìyà bí kò ṣe aláìmoore?
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
